name: BetMonitor
header: Custom Software for a Gambling Operator
description:
A tool built for office staff containing a bet feed, live betting pattern analysis, daily/monthly reporting capabilities as well as various QOL utilities for other tasks.

Built using Python and SQL with Tkinter UI, it now performs a vital role in the company for in-house traders, giving them quick information and assistance at a glance.

Links to Pipedrive, Google and internal company API's for up to date client and compliance information.

name: BetCalculator
header: React frontend for Betcruncher.js by Catena-Media.
description:
Working for a gambling operator, we regularly use online bet calculators to work out potential returns, check payouts are correct & break down the workings of a wager for clients.

Betcruncher.js is a bet calculator engine made in javascript (https://github.com/Catena-Media/betcruncher).

I wanted an excuse to use React, so used it to make a simple frontend with MUI components.

name: PlaysTVScraper
header: Web Scraper for Plays.tv using Wayback Machine
description:
PlaysTV was a clip sharing site built for PC gaming, which unfortunately went down suddenly in 2019 along with all the content.

Around 100 clips that had been uploaded to my account were lost, the only place some were still available was on the Internet Archive Wayback Machine.

Using Selenium and BeautifulSoup, I was able to scrape and retrieve most of the clips for myself & friends.

name: AudioSwitcher
header: Tool to switch between two audio devices.
description:
A very simple script to capture enabled audio output devices and switch to the next one in the list.

To use instead of going into Windows sound settings to switch from headphones to speakers or vice versa, and built to be keybinded.

name: BackgroundChecker
header: Bot to prevent changing of background
description:
A fun background service to prevent housemates changing the desktop wallpaper on a shared PC.

If background gets changed, it is reset to default, sends a text notification, and Rick Astley's No.1 hit opens on full volume.

name: RecipeApp
description:
An in-progress simple recipe sharing app using React and C#.

Built with the ambition to have an alternative to the current line up of bloated recipe websites.
Users can add, edit and delete recipes, as well as like and comment on others.

Built as a learning project.
